scripts.deploy: npm run build && cdk bootstrap --profile Personal && cdk deploy --profile Personal --require-approval never && rm -r cdk.out
scripts.cdk-synth-template:Backend: npm run build && cdk synth --no-staging BackendStack > BackendStack-template.yml
scripts.start-api:Backend: npm run cdk-synth-template:Backend && sam local start-api -t ./BackendStack-template.yml -p 4000 -d 5858
